      4. ì½”ë“œ:

      Import-Module ActiveDirectory

$AllUsers = Get-ADUser -filter {cn -like "*"} -Properties *
$AllUsers | select displayname,UserPrincipalName,EmailAddress | export-csv -Encoding UTF8 <ë¡œì»¬ íŒŒì¼ ê²½ë¡œ>.csv
